description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle your way through a seemingly endless horde of monsters on a journey to stop their evil leader.  Defeat monsters to earn glory and upgrade your equipment.
description.short: Battle your way through a seemingly endless horde of monsters on a journey to stop their evil leader.  Defeat monsters to earn glory and upgrade your equipment.
